docPage.a11yProps: If you are using File list like shown above, don't forget to add ``aria-label`` to the button.

sampleFileLink.name: sampleFileLink
sampleFileLink.description: Link component to download sample file

data-test.name: data-test
data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.

multiple.name: multiple
multiple.description: Allow drag 'n' drop (or selection from the file dialog) of multiple files

preventDropOnDocument.name: preventDropOnDocument
preventDropOnDocument.description: If false, allow dropped items to take over the current browser window

getFilesFromEvent.name: getFilesFromEvent
getFilesFromEvent.description: Use this to provide a custom file aggregator

onFileDialogCancel.name: onFileDialogCancel
onFileDialogCancel.description: Callback for when closing the file dialog with no selection

onDragEnter.name: onDragEnter
onDragEnter.description: Callback for when the `dragenter` event occurs.

onDragLeave.name: onDragLeave
onDragLeave.description: Callback for when the `dragleave` event occurs

onDragOver.name: onDragOver
onDragOver.description: Callback for when the `dragover` event occurs

onDrop.name: onDrop

type.name: function
type.value: ((event: Event | DragEvent, acceptedFiles: File[], rejectedFiles: FileRejection[]) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((event: Event | DragEvent, acceptedFiles: File[], rejectedFiles: FileRejection[]) => void) | undefined

onDropAccepted.name: onDropAccepted
onDropAccepted.description:
Callback for when the `drop` event occurs.
Note that if no files are accepted, this callback is not invoked.

type.name: function
type.value: ((event: Event | DragEvent, files: File[]) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((event: Event | DragEvent, files: File[]) => void) | undefined

onDropRejected.name: onDropRejected
onDropRejected.description:
Callback for when the `drop` event occurs.
Note that if no files are rejected, this callback is not invoked.

type.name: function
type.value: ((event: Event | DragEvent, rejectedFiles: FileRejection[]) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((event: Event | DragEvent, rejectedFiles: FileRejection[]) => void) | undefined

validator.name: validator
validator.description:
Custom validation function
The value must be a function that accepts File object and returns null if file should be accepted
or error object/array of error objects if file should me rejected
